title: Natural Bridges National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Natural Bridges is open year-round. Visitor center hours change with the season.    Dates Visitor Center Hours    October 18 - November 30 9 am - 5 pm   December 1 - March 2016 9 am - 4:30 pm   April 2016 - May 14 8 am - 5 pm    May 15 - September 2016 8 am - 6 pm      The visitor center is closed on Thanksgiving, December 25, and January 1.
